name: Meetup+
description:
Just a rapid patch for the layout of meetup.com.
Now with a fixed width of 1024px (larger than standard).

Update:
24/07/08 - larger font for assistant's box.
22/09/08 - fixed tags.
13/11/08 - various fixes.
25/11/08 - various fixes.
18/02/09 - small fix: width increased to 1024px.
13/07/09 - small fixes.
